job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: <p>Our client, leading automotive supplier, is looking for machine learning engineer, to join their team in Berlin area.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Responsibilities</strong></p><ul><li>Design, code, experiment and implement models and algorithms</li><li>Work closely with researchers to take research developed ML models to production</li><li>Build and improve existing data pipelines</li><li>Implement a cloud-enabled architecture</li><li>Contribute to and influence technology and product strategy and roadmaps</li></ul><p><br></p><p>&nbsp;<strong>Qualifications</strong></p><ul><li>&nbsp;Degree in computer science or electrical engineering </li><li>&nbsp;3-5 years of experience in software development, applications and services </li><li>Good knowledge of Python and DevOps</li><li>Fluent German&nbsp;and English</li></ul>
